That page was last edited late in 2010 and is intended for use with Heritrix
1. The technique is similar for Heritrix 3, but not documented there. I have
put this on my list to update today.

Travis

On Mon, January 9, 2012 5:48 am, hatoum13 wrote:
> I am looking for a best solution to crawl youtube channels and now I am
> following this titoriel :
> https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/YouTube
>
> And i'm interrested to try it and ameliorate it. But to start using it I found
> some problem with second and third steps :
> - In settings/com/youtube/settings.xml
> - In settings/com/youtube/settings.xml
>
> I don't know where should I find these files, and when I try to launch
> whithout 2 and 3 steps, an error, saying that "newObject" is not found as a
> bean, will appear.
>
> Thanks.
>
>
